root: ^Mysterious Entity: I cannot remember how long it has been since I have met another human before.
^Mysterious Entity: The last time I met a human being, it looked similar to you. Only, you appear to have kept your sanity. For the timebeing.
^Mysterious Entity: Long ago, I was created as the serving caretaker for this construct that you humans would call the Tower. Would you like to know what this construct's purpose was?
